name: Lost Sky
description:
This is a short 3d platformer made in UE5

Controls:

-Mouse:Look around
-W-A-S-D/Directional pad: Move

-Escape: Close the game

Since it's my first time making a game in that engine  and I did this in a few days, the game isn't optimized, so really sorry for any inconveniences!

Hope you have fun! ^-^
